backend/main.mo: Actor implementing access control, user profiles, and inquiry creation and admin-only management with storage mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module passing old actor state through unchanged to maintain compatibility during upgrades.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and utility layers defining custom OKLCH color variables and dark-mode theme tokens.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document bootstrapping the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component handling hash-based routing between home, admin inquiries, and admin gallery views.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button wired to Internet Identity with loading states and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/contact/ContactF: Validated contact form submitting inquiries through a React Query mutation with success and error handling.
Brand badge component displaying the Loura logo and text with hover effects.
frontend/src/components/site/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with branding, quick links, contact info, and a dynamic year plus a referral link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/site/GalleryLigh: Provides a modal lightbox for gallery images with navigation, close controls, and an image counter.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/Ab: Displays an About section with company background, highlight features, and a branded image.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/Co: Shows a contact form alongside structured contact info and a list of company advantages.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/Ga: Renders a gallery using uploaded images when available, with a grid layout and integrated lightbox viewer.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/He: Creates the homepage hero with background image, headline, and buttons for contacting or viewing services.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/Se: Lists core services in card layout and includes a link to request a project quote.
frontend/src/components/site/TopNav.tsx: Implements a sticky top navigation bar with smooth-scrolling links, mobile drawer menu, and an Admin button.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminGuard.ts: Checks if the current authenticated user is an admin and exposes loading, auth, and admin state.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateInquiry.ts: Provides a mutation to create a new inquiry via the backend and invalidates inquiry lists on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useGallery.ts: Provides queries and mutations for listing, fetching, uploading, and deleting gallery images through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInquiries.ts: Exposes queries to list inquiries or fetch a single inquiry using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, loading stored identities, and providing login and logout functions.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining theme variables and utility classes for layout and components.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers and mounts it to the DOM.
frontend/src/pages/AdminGalleryPage.tsx: Admin page for listing, uploading, and deleting gallery images with authentication and admin checks.
frontend/src/pages/AdminInquiriesPage.ts: Admin dashboard for viewing and navigating customer inquiries with authentication and admin gating.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them when needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for the project.
project_state.json: Describes the project state, features, and requirements for building the Loura Earth Mover website.
